biotools.summary: Megraft is a software tool to graft ribosomal small subunit (16S/18S) fragments from metagenomes onto full-length SSU sequences, enabling accurate diversity estimates from fragmentary and non-overlapping sequence data.

bioschemas.name: Megraft
bioschemas.summary: Megraft is a software tool to graft ribosomal small subunit (16S/18S) fragments from metagenomes onto full-length SSU sequences, enabling accurate diversity estimates from fragmentary and non-overlapping sequence data.
